column4: hi, I've just installed ubuntu on a virtualBox , how do I navigate to my cd-rom dir ?
in the virtual machine do you see any icons?
I didn't , I was just wondering why one of them not working
nope, but I think I'm going to , I am ordering a slicehost account
so ubuntu has tools to facilitate this ?
there is pretty good info on the page
does it matter where I exeute the install command ?
